alert.note: Alert for Meigs; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:20AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, eastern Washington, Pleasants, northern Calhoun, Ritchie, central Mason, northwestern Doddridge, Tyler, Wirt, northwestern Roane, Jackson and Wood Counties through 1000 AM EST... At 919 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Sistersville to near Buffalo. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Marietta, Belpre, Ripley, Spencer, Harrisville, St. Marys, Elizabeth, Middlebourne, Grantsville, Vienna, Ravenswood, Williamstown, Paden City, Sistersville, Pennsboro, Belmont, West Union, Sandyville and Mineralwells. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 127 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 2. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 4 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
